<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/conversations/{conversation_id}/security/{path}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Catch-all route for security analyzer API POST requests

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"conversation_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Conversation ID"},{"name":"path","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Security analyzer API path"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":false,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

>
  
</StatusCodes>
